document.discussion_title: Flood alert issued for River Calder
document.topic_text: Hebden Bridge Times , 8 February 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Flood alert issued for River Calder The Environment Agency has issued a flood alert for Luddenden Foot and Sowerby Bridge as heavy rain continues to fall across the area. The flood alert, which means flooding is possible and people should be prepared, was issued for the River Calder... Halifax Courier , 14 August 2015 in Yorkshire & Humber Flood alert issued for River Calder The Environment Agency has issued a flood alert for Luddenden Foot and Sowerby Bridge as heavy rain continues to fall across the area. The flood alert, which means flooding is possible and people should be prepared, was issued for the River Calder... Hebden Bridge Times , 14 August 2015 in Yorkshire & Humber
